post.body: Hello ZeroMe!

Help me spread my content please !

I am a german dad, who like to draw, do music, animations & other videos ... and believe me, there is a lot more to explore about my family and i ... If this system will work, and a lot users distribute my images, i will make everything i ever created available for you here too. Got a lot cartoons, music, blogs, ... and much more waiting to be translated  from german to english for you.

Let me introduce to you ...
... an animated series i will try to launch in #2020: "The BussToons-Family"

Let me introduce to you ...
... the old soul of my upcoming animated series "The BussToons-Family"
_________
My ZeroBlog is online now and will be filled soon, follow me for more content releases: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PagpBK46X7cMnZMJFwSihFkTLYeSYAq9U

I need your HELP please !

I created a backup of my website on ZeroNet, without cloning one of those available examples ... CAN YOU ENTER IT ??? It Should look like this image and is available at: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Pgd98eF8yySD9yBRpjhsYAo1SMjzfrW4/

Do you like funny comics?
 
... had a long break drawing, but here is my first digital created comic in english. I will try to translate as many old content as possible, to make it available at my upcoming ZeroNet-Zite: 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/ ... follow me to make this project grow.

Day 2: ... adding MP3-files

My first Zite is growing every day. Today i added the new menu-item "AUDIO" and 2 coverings many by my wife and i.

Will add more MUSIC now to fill those blank pages ... come back later if you are too fast and share my content to make me upload more!

My Zite: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/index.html

WALLPAPERS & AUDIO on my beta zite now !
... fixed some more bugs
... added more audio tracks
... cleaned up everything

My Zite beta v0.22 is ready now !

... added WALLPAPERS, MUSIC, BACKING TRACKS, ... and more is coming day by day! If you like it, share it to support my project and make me release more on ZeroNet.

Greetings from censored Germany.
#BussDee

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww

#BUSSDEE-PRODUCTION

PEERS are growing, love you all !
... time is ticking, next update will be available in a couple of hours.

dont miss it: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/

Adding more content every day:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D

Interessiert an weiteren deutschen Inhalten?

Zeigt mir euer Interesse mit einem Klick auf das kleine HERZ unter dem Text. Wenn genug deutsche Leser hier verfÃ¼gbar sind, dann werde ich die Website auch in deutsch anbieten.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D

Got a question to all ZeroNet Professionals ...

... i own a NAS Server. I use this to host all my media files and play it with PLEX. I could use this server to support ZeroNet 24/7 ... any hints how to make it work?

I have never released any pictures of my daughters face .. so i will in the future. But i made her a cartoon:

... dont miss my other CARTOONS, MUSIC, DOWNLOADS, ARTICLES, ... on my beta zite @ http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/
To finish my family ... here is my wife as a cartoon

Seems like there will be an INTERNET 2.0 in a couple of weeks !!!

Solid empowers users and organizations to separate their data from the applications that use it. It allows people to look at the same data with different apps at the same time. It opens brand new avenues for creativity, problem-solving, and commerce. Learn how it came to be @ https://solid.inrupt.com

Try to create your own point&click game in the style of lucas arts?

...i will help you getting started with this 4-way character download: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/download.html

Installed Pi-Hole today
... no commercials in my LAN now anymore!

If you are pissed of all those commercials in YouTube Videos or your favorite Websites, just install this on your Raspberry Pie and you won't see any commercials on any website!  ;)

https://pi-hole.net

Seems like i can't get a SOLID POD working on my Raspberry Pi. Time to visit my dusty basement, to find an old Laptop i can install Linux onto .... followed by a SOLID POD ....i hope so.  ^^

If i missed anything and you can help me make it possible on a Raspberry Pi, please leave a comment.

And dont forget to visit my ZITE ... new updates coming soon:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/

NEED HELP !

Right now i am setting up a Solid POD (https://solid.inrupt.com) on my DEBIAN 9 Linuxsystem, but INIT is making some trouble.

1. i created an URL on no-ip.com
2. then, requested and installed the certificate using:
   $ certbot certonly --authenticator standalone -d MYURL
3. when i got prompted this, i think i made a mistake, cause i couldn't found the files and tried some others:

? Path to the SSL private key in PEM format /etc/letsencrypt/live/your.host.org/privkey.pem
? Path to the SSL certificate key in PEM format /etc/letsencrypt/live/your.host.org/fullchain.pem

... /etc/letsencrypt/live/ dont exist on my system, what have i done wrong ??? This is what i get, when i try to start the server:

i am a qualified electrician since 2000 ...

... and it only took me 5 years to make my entertainment center in the living room look good. Just need to buy some cable tunnels on monday, and the magic hands of my fiancee to do some decorations, to make it perfect.

So much space now ... time to get more nerdy-tech.  ^^

Added a new menu-item for the upcoming archive of GERMAN uncensored content i created in the past. Have a look at those titles, will add all of those as a start, every time my daughter gives me a little break. ;)

My Zite: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/

Clintons visit Germany! Picture from the Oktoberfest !

... after reading this wikipedia article, maybe your brain can find some similarities: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immanentize_the_eschaton

SIRI, Echo, ... not in my home ... i love my privacy !

That's why i will try to install PICROFT on my Raspberry Pi now:
Picroft is an enclosure for a Raspberry Pi 3 or 3B+ connected to a speaker and microphone, bringing Mycroft to anyone who wants a simple voice interface they have complete control over. This is built on top of the officiall Raspbian Stretch Lite image.

The entire project is available as a pre-built micro-SD image ready to be burned and placed into a Raspberry Pi. You can download the pre-built image here: https://mycroft.ai/to/picroft-unstable

1. Download
2. Burn .iso to your SD-card
3. plugin microphone (usb) & speakers (3.5mm audio)
4. start your Pi and have FUN !

I own a big NAS server with TBs of music, movies, shows, education videos, ... and WIFI switches to control some of my lights and electronic hardware. With this i can use those with my voice like: "Hello Elfriede, play sexy music and turn off the lights in the bedroom!"   :D
_________________________________
 
PiCroft on Github:
https://github.com/MycroftAI/enclosure-picroft 

PiCroft in action (YouTube):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OH5T08IsMrU

Need help installing?  (YouTube):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RZOejoVVUVo

Change to german language:
https://mycroft.ai/documentation/language-support/german/

BIG DAY !
... thanks to all supporters (peers) for my zite:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/

Do you know english well ?
I am searching for help to translate my german articles to good english. All my old german content is stored on my site. If you can spend 5 Minutes, please copy & paste one of my articles into a translator, correct the mistakes, and send it to me  .... i will add it to the next update and link your name to your own zite if you like.

Here is a list of articles that need to be translated:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/blog_de.html

Added almost all of our old coversongs to my zite now:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/audio_nise.html

Redesigning some old #characters for #Spreadshirt because of a little lack of #creativity. If you got any ideas for cool #art ... leave me your ideas, and i will try to #create those one in my #style.

Dont miss my Zite:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/

Seen in my hometown ...
... do i need to understand Islam ?

My new AVATAR is in development now ...
.... step 1: sketching

My new AVATAR is in development now ...
.... step 2: colored sketch

My Zite: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/
Have a nice weekend everyone !

Time to activate some brains:

Do you remember the Song / Musicvideo made by "Rage against the machine" called "Sleep Now In The Fire" ???

- Made its live debut on September 11, 1999
- Made by Michael Moore
- points on fight against "Deep State"
- show politicians as puppets
- Donald Trump - Poster
- "Gnostics" explained
- Answer for the question "What letter follows A ?"  ---> Q

... just for the record, in June 1999 JFK junior died and Q was born !

Too many connections for a coincidence, right ?
Make your own decision and watch it by yourself:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w211KOQ5BMI

Ohh no, i got one too !!!   o_0
#MAGAbomb #FakeNews
#HAPPY HALLOWEEN
#MERRY XMAS

I AM BACK !!!
... now let me know what to do next ...
Music, Artworks, Comics, WebZite Updates, ...

The Deep State is going down and my Zite is going back UP.
Check the old content, new releases are coming soon !

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CvtJKNdcjX14d1WzuZNGcR6BtqYaa36ww/index.html

Stop complaining about climate, talk about silly politics, free speech, ...  thats something important ... not something invented by a stupid and money hungry brain who use more stupid people to believe a story and ignore facts.  ;)

publishing in germany is not very easy right now, you have to know all those new laws, even our politicians dont understand. I love to learn coding websites and i love to publish my created content to get some feedback  ... nice place to do this inhere, while experimenting with the Solid POD.

@Moor: because i am old and i never heard of ... thanks, will give it a try next time i need one.

@Moor: if you are not talking like mainstream, you maybe get fired by your boss ... if you dont talk nice about politics, refugees, rapist, ... you are a Nazi  .... if you talk about holocaust you will go to jail .... many things made me avoid publishing my opinions on the net since years.

@leftside: a couple of years ago, i bought this LG Flatscreen for half the price, cause nobody want to have a white frame. ^^
... i still love it, almost my entire living room is WHITE & green (flowers), this black laptop will be changed to a white MacBook next week ... so i can get rid off the ugly black stuff. Just need to paint my NAS Server (hidden behind the flowers) and get a new (white) phone. ^^

@Pigpog: Got all Nintendo consoles (missing Wii U & Switch for now) in origin, that one is just a 10 bucks NESmini from gearbest. But since i use RETROPIE i dont need all those consoles anymore, got all my games on a small Raspberry Pi now.  ^^

you are awaiting news on google for projects like this?
Before they do commercials for things like this, the will shadowban it, to make people not know about it. ^^

@leftside: i tried to find the name of my first console, but no success.
It looks a bit like the Atari 2600, but with a big keyboard on that big black front. Very simple games, like 2 cowboys duel ... 1 left, 1 right and some trees for cover in the middle. Should be released in the 70th  ... followed by Atari, C64 and finally AMIGA, before i got all Nintendo consoles. I cant wait to make my daughter play all those simple old games when she becomes older (14 month right now, love to watch me play Overwatch, screaming "PENG, PENG" and clapping her hands)

lovely!
i was grown up by my mum cause my father left us when i was a baby. Met my dad a couple of years ago ... he dont love anything i love to do.  :/
@leftside: i created a lot content that is not available anymore because of german censorship. Those articles & videos got deleted from social networks like Facebook & YouTube.
congrats and good luck for the feature. Got 20 peers after 24 hours, this community is amazing!

if someone need to spread this to the world, he/she/it is not interesting for me  ... no it is very boring any annoying in my opinion. Try facebook, they will love you and talk hours about things nobody is interested to read about.  ^^

... and i love cats
@Daniell Mesquita: or just save the file to an USB stick  xD

i know a lot homosexual people, some of them are good friends.  But i dont like people who need to spread this information.  I dont tell others all day long, that i like cats, that i love to do sports ... and i wouldn't talk about my sexuality in a public space   ...  its not interesting for others and its annoying. Do whatever you like, have sex with whatever you like  ... but dont make a story out of it!

I think people use this, to get attention  ... none of my friends talk about sex in public spaces  ... none of any gender / sex / ...   If you have to talk publicly about such things to be happy, you have a mistake in the brain.

free speech is to post your (AND MINE) opinion.  If you dont like it, you have to deal with it. I dont hurt anybody with my opinion and i dont JUDGE anybody ... just telling what i think.  But if you dont have any interesting things to talk about, go on with this BS here on ZeroNet too ... but dont think you will get a lot followers ... people left facebook because of discussions like this ... here on ZN i just press the MUTE button and i am good to go  ;)

WAKE UP little boy, there is a world outsite the world you live in (created by movies, tv shows, social networks). Have a nice weekend, i dont have time to spend for this BS.
